inlineContent.text: Antenna offsets are the offset of the camera relative to the antenna attached to viDoc for a specific device.
Depending on the device used, we return the specific camera offset that works best.

code: case Camera // This type of offset will be removed in future versions of the SDK. Use SPCAlt
case SPCAlt // SPC Alt - All Measurements concerning Antenna bottom (Zero Point)
case SPC // SPC - All Measurements concerning Antenna relate to the top of alucase
case SPCPlus // For viDoc with SPC+ case
case SPCPlusLight // For viDoc Light with SPC+ case
case Laser // The laser offset in relation to the antenna's position

inlineContent.text: Distance from Alucase to bottom of antenna - SPC = 11 mm
Distance from Alucase to bottom of antenna - SPC+ = 11 mm
Distance from Alucase to bottom of antenna - viDocLight SPC+ = 8 mm

code: // Distance from the bottom of the antenna to the center (cm).
// Distance from the bottom of the device to the center (cm).
